titleStmt.title: A narration of the expedition to Taunton; the raising the siege before it, and the condition of our forces, and the enemies, at this present in the west. / Sent from a commander in the army, and dated at Chard, May 18. 1645. Published by authoritie.
titleStmt.author: Commander in the army.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
